metadata.dc:title: Evolution of the materials used in sterilisation processes
metadata.dc:description: This article reveals the existing need to consider the sterilisation centres of hospitals and primary health care centres as high cost centres as well as the introduction of the certification of sterilisation centres according to the ISO 9001 quality standard to achieve excellence in sterilisation (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: García Salions, P
metadata.dc:title: Evolución de los materiales utilizados en los procesos de esterilización
